description: First American Financial Corporation, the second-largest title insurance company in the United States, revealed on Tuesday that a December cyberattack led to a breach impacting 44,000 individuals. [...]
title: First American December data breach impacts 44,000 people

description: Over 90 malicious Android apps were found installed over 5.5 million times through Google Play to deliver malware and adware, with the Anatsa banking trojan seeing a recent surge in activity. [...]
title: Over 90 malicious Android apps with 5.5M installs found on Google Play

description: The U.S. Treasury Department has sanctioned a cybercrime network comprising three Chinese nationals and three Thailand-based companies linked to a massive botnet controlling a residential proxy service known as "911 S5." [...]
title: US govt sanctions cybercrime gang behind massive 911 S5 botnet

description: The U.S. Treasury Department has sanctioned a cybercrime network comprising three Chinese nationals and three Thailand-based companies linked to a massive botnet controlling a residential proxy service known as "911 S5." [...]
title: US govt sanctions cybercrime gang behind massive 911 S5 botnet

description: A 31-year-old Russian national named Evgeniy Doroshenko has been indicted for wire and computer fraud in the United States for allegedly acting as an "initial access broker" from February 2019 to May 2024. [...]
title: Russian indicted for selling access to US corporate networks

description: ​Microsoft has linked a North Korean hacking group it tracks as Moonstone Sleet to FakePenny ransomware attacks, which have led to millions of dollars in ransom demands. [...]
title: Microsoft links North Korean hackers to new FakePenny ransomware

description: ​Security researchers have released a proof-of-concept (PoC) exploit for a maximum-severity vulnerability in Fortinet's security information and event management (SIEM) solution, which was patched in February. [...]
title: Exploit released for maximum severity Fortinet RCE bug, patch now

description: Christie's confirmed that it suffered a security incident earlier this month after the RansomHub extortion gang claimed responsibility and threatened to leak stolen data. [...]
title: Christie’s confirms breach after RansomHub threatens to leak data

description: Many users report that YouTube videos automatically skip to the end or muting video if they are using an ad blocker, making it impossible for them to watch the video. [...]
title: Ad blocker users say YouTube videos are now skipping to the end
